thread.title: Playboy searches for Playmates during the Midsummer Night's Dream in Las Vegas
thread.title_full: Playboy searches for Playmates during the Midsummer Night's Dream in Las Vegas

author: Susan Stapleton
title: Playboy searches for Playmates during the Midsummer Night's Dream in Las Vegas
text:
Playboy searches for Playmates during the Midsummer Night's Dream in Las Vegas Light Nightclub 
Light Nightclub hosts Playboy's Midsummer Night's Dream on July 11. 
Light Nightclub hosts Playboy's Midsummer Night's Dream on July 11. (Light Nightclub) By Susan Stapleton 
A Las Vegas version of Playboy Mansion's Midsummer Night’s Dream party returns July 10-11 at Light Nightclub and Daylight Beach Club at Mandalay Bay . 0 
The weekend starts at Daylight Beach Club with contestants vying for a shot at becoming a Playboy Playmate. The winner lands the “Ultimate Playmate Experience” with airfare to Los Angeles, hotel accommodations and a photo shoot at the Playboy studio. The top three finalists get a total of $5,000 in cash prizes. 
Then Light Nightclub hosts Playboy’s Midsummer Night’s Dream party on Saturday, July 11. The “1,001 Arabian Nights”-themed fantasyland encourages costumes, the scantier, the better. Deejay Irie will be on the decks. 
Other festivities include a Playmate takeover of Light on Friday, July 10, and rapper and deejay Will.i.am on hand at Daylight on Saturday, July 11. 
Tickets start at $20 for women and $30 for men. 
Tickets: TicketDriver , (702) 693-8300
